text: (He said) Moses said to him: (In truth thou knowest) O Pharaoh (that none sent down these (portents)) these signs (save the Lord of the heavens and the earth as proofs) as an indication and sign of my prophethood, (and lo! (for my part) I deem) I know and believe (thee lost, O Pharaoh) that you are a lost disbeliever.
